rooms.description: Scandinavian style entrance with modern minimalist design and ample natural light. Incorporates Vastu by aligning the entrance to the northeast for positive energy flow.
Open-plan living area with seating arrangements that encourage conversation and connection. Includes integrated Scandinavian elements such as light color palettes and functional furniture.

Open kitchen design adjoining the living room with Scandinavian aesthetics, featuring clean lines, neutral colors, and efficient workstations. Vastu principles suggest placing the cooking area in the southeast for prosperity.
Adjacent to the kitchen, a dining space designed to promote family gatherings with subtle Nordic design elements and natural lighting.
Quiet study area featuring Scandinavian minimalist decor, soft lighting, comfortable seating, and built-in bookshelves. Placed in the west as per Vastu to enhance creativity.
Compact bathroom with Scandinavian design emphasizing functionality and simplicity, incorporating modern fixtures and natural light where possible.
Small utility space for storage of cleaning supplies and maintenance equipment, designed in a Scandinavian style with concealed storage solutions.

openings.description: Large, energy-efficient windows designed to maximize natural light and provide ventilation in accordance with Scandinavian design principles.
Minimalist doors that allow seamless transitions between spaces.
Scandinavian-style balcony providing an outdoor extension for relaxation and natural light enhancement, adhering to local building norms.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with Scandinavian design elements emphasizing comfort and tranquility. Features a private balcony aligned with the north for Vastu benefits.
Additional bedroom designed for privacy, following minimalist Scandinavian aesthetics and efficient use of space.
Another bedroom in the first floor with a functional layout and simple design consistent with Scandinavian style.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom with modern fixtures and efficient space utilization.

openings.description: Large windows to ensure ample natural light and enhance the sense of space.
Private balcony extending from the master bedroom, designed for relaxation and natural light enhancement.
